properties.entry: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW csr AS ( SELECT errors.rel, errors.tid, errors.att, prov_source_tramp_tid , prov_source_soupkitchen_tid , prov_source_socialworker_tid , prov_source_socialworker_1_tid FROM (SELECT PROVENANCE ON CONTRIBUTION (COPY PARTIAL TRANSITIVE) tid,name FROM target.person) AS prov, (SELECT * FROM errm WHERE att & 'B10'::varbit != 'B00'::varbit) AS errors WHERE errors.tid = prov.tid UNION ALL SELECT errors.rel, errors.tid, errors.att, prov_source_tramp_tid , prov_source_soupkitchen_tid , prov_source_socialworker_tid , prov_source_socialworker_1_tid FROM (SELECT PROVENANCE ON CONTRIBUTION (COPY PARTIAL TRANSITIVE) tid,livesin FROM target.person) AS prov, (SELECT * FROM errm WHERE att & 'B01'::varbit != 'B00'::varbit) AS errors WHERE errors.tid = prov.tid )
